title: You Can Talk to a Conservative Like a Normal Human Being (with Gerald Russello)
itunes:title: You Can Talk to a Conservative Like a Normal Human Being (with Gerald Russello)
description:
Gerald Russello, the editor of University Bookman and conservative intellectual, joins Jessa Crispin to talk about the growing political divide in American politics, and how the left is just as annoying as the right. 
 
Support this podcast: patreon.com/publicintellectual
